name: Golden Star
description: Awarded for exceptional contribution to the community

name: Rising Star
description: Given to promising new members showing great potential

name: Helpful Soul
description: Recognizes consistent helpful responses to community questions

name: Creative Mind
description: Awarded for innovative ideas and creative solutions

name: Community Champion
description: For outstanding leadership and community engagement

name: Thoughtful Contributor
description: Awarded for well-reasoned and balanced discussions

name: Perfect Post
description: Given to posts that receive exceptional engagement and praise

name: Bug Hunter
description: For identifying and reporting important issues

name: Mentor Master
description: Recognizes consistent guidance and mentorship to others

name: Quick Responder
description: Awarded for providing timely and helpful responses

name: Verified Expert
description: For demonstrating exceptional expertise in a specific area

name: Community Builder
description: Recognizes efforts in building and strengthening the community

name: Distinguished Member
description: Highest honor for long-term dedication to the community
